body: In a nutshell women are smart and creative and men are dumb and irritable but good at sports.

body: Male brains have more connections within hemispheres to optimize motor skills, whereas female brains are more connected between hemispheres to combine analytical and intuitive thinking
body_html: Male brains have more connections within hemispheres to optimize motor skills, whereas female brains are more connected between hemispheres to combine analytical and intuitive thinking

body: Precisely, meaning male thinking is inferior in almost every way. It makes sense historically but unfortunately the role of warrior/laborer is not as necessary in today's world, so us men are stuck with obsolete skills our whole lives (and they were the unfavorable ones to begin with). What's even worse is that this specialization was not cemented before puberty, so we have a taste of what could've been. I'll also note that women can use both sides of their brain while in men only the left side is usually used, and even then not as well as both sides of the female brain.
body_html: Precisely, meaning male thinking is inferior in almost every way. It makes sense historically but unfortunately the role of warrior/laborer is not as necessary in today's world, so us men are stuck with obsolete skills our whole lives (and they were the unfavorable ones to begin with). What's even worse is that this specialization was not cemented before puberty, so we have a taste of what could've been. I'll also note that women can use both sides of their brain while in men only the left side is usually used, and even then not as well as both sides of the female brain.
